description:
Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Jonouchi has no monsters to defend with!  Jonouchi’s luck has run out, so it’s time for him to rely on skill!  Meanwhile, Anzu challenges Marik for control of the Millennium Rod, but will she survive against Marik’s mystical powers of great evil?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blue Eyes White Dragon vs Blue Eyes White Dragon
Blue-Eyes White Dragon vs Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Duel pour la troisième place - 2e partie
青眼の白龍[ブルーアイズ・ホワイトドラゴン]VS青眼の白龍[ブルーアイズ・ホワイトドラゴン]
